abstract: The campaign begins Monday and also involves the U.S. Paralympic team.
snippet: The campaign begins Monday and also involves the U.S. Paralympic team.
lead_paragraph: For the first time, Citi will sponsor the United States Olympic and Paralympic teams, in an effort that includes an advertising campaign that will begin on Monday to help the company support athletes and advertise its mobile-banking products. It joins a number of other financial-services firms as an Olympics sponsor, including Visa.

headline.main: Citi to Sponsor U.S. Olympic Team, in Campaign Promoting Mobile Banking
